greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangles with integer sides i <= j <= k sorted by area, and, in case of ties, lexicographically by side lengths (smallest first). The sequence gives middle side j. The other sides are in A331251 and A331253.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 19 2020
